name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, rel. Charles R. HILL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Hill v. Commonwealth
docket_number: Nos. 053 and 054 Middle District Appeal Docket 1996

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, rel. Charles R. HILL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 26th day of September, 1996, the appeal at No. 054 M.D., Appeal Docket 1996 is quashed. The appeal at No. 053 is quashed; treating it as a petition for allowance of appeal, Pa.R.A.P. 1102, the petition for allowance of appeal is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
682 A.2d 1267
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, rel. Charles R. HILL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Nos. 053 and 054 Middle District Appeal Docket 1996.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 26, 1996.
